name: Portuguese Sangria
description: Portuguese Sangria is sweet and acidic at the same time.
ingredients: 2 oranges (one whole and another for juice)
directions: Slice the fruit and mix with the brown sugar, Port Wine and the mint leaves in a big bowl;
Pour the lemon and the orange juice on the mixture and let it rest for an hour;
Put everything in a jug and then add the wine and the soda on top;
Finally, add the cinnamon sticks and ice to your taste. Enjoy!
